p.p: Specific set of codes for describing endorsements that a prescriber may apply to a prescription.
This will generally be present in an Observation act where the code attribute has an id value of "PE" from the Prescription Annotation vocabulary.

The concepts defined by this code system are maintained externally by the Electronic Prescription Service (EPS).
For guidance please refer to the NPFIT-ETP-EIM-0015 Guidance for Endorsement in the Electronic Prescription Service.
